name: Tappy Thing
description:
Midwest Recreational Computing Corporation is proud to present Tappy Thing, an exciting new entertainment software product! 

Leveraging the power of Unreal Engine 5, prepare to be amazed as nearly dozens of objects, each made up of more than 2 polygons, are sent whirring across the screen in this fast paced adventure!

Controls:
  • Left click or space bar to flap
  • F11 to enter or exit full screen mode
  • Escape to exit/close the game
Minimum Confirmed Specs:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • CPU: Intel Core i7-4770K
  • Memory: 16GB Ram
  • Video Card: GeForce GTX 980 TI
  • DirectX: 12
  • Hard Drive Space: 275 MB
